remarks: Sylow's second theorem.  See also ~ sylow2b for the "hard" part of the proof.  Any two Sylow ` P ` -subgroups are conjugate to one another, and hence the same size, namely ` P ^ ( P pCnt | X | ) ` (see ~ fislw ). This is part of Metamath 100 proof #72.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jan-2015.)
